article_title: Israel releases head of Gaza's al-Shifa hospital after seven months
sentence: As  he  was  released,  Dr  Abu  Salmiya  alleged  that  some  medical  staff  detained  by  Israel  had  died  in  prison  of  torture.

article_title: Israel releases head of Gaza's al-Shifa hospital after seven months
sentence: In  April,  Dr  Adnan  al-Bursh  -  who  was  head  of  orthopaedics  at  al-Shifa  hospital  -  is  reported  to  have  died  in  detention.
